article:
Francis is walking on the street of a foreign city. He can _ a person about 200 meters from him. The person seems to be a girl. She is holding a large piece of _ high above her head. He cannot see what is on the paper, so he keeps on  _  towards the girl.
As he comes closer, he can see the girl  _ . She is about 20 years old. She is tall and slim with black hair. And he can also see the words on the paper: FREE HUGS. Francis does not understand. He goes to the girl but _ ten meters from her. The girl looks at him, smiling.
A woman goes to the girl. The girl hugs _ . Then the woman goes away _ a big smile. Now Francis understands.  _  can go to the girl and hug her for free. Francis is surprised. He thinks this is a _ idea. He goes to the girl to hug her. When they are finished, he thanks the girl. The girl smiles at him and she _ him, too. Then he walks away from the girl. He feels stronger, younger and happier.
